title: Pope Benedict failed to act against abusive priests, Munich Church report finds
content:
1. Pope Benedict failed to act against abusive priests, Munich Church report finds  NBC News
  2. Report faults Pope Benedict for German priest abuse cases in 1970s, '80s  KRIS 6 News
  3. Pope Benedict XVI knew of abusive priests when he ran Munich archdiocese, investigators say  CNN
  4. Benedict Faulted for Handling of Abuse Cases When He Was an Archbishop  The New York Times
  5. Pope Benedict accused of wrongdoing in Munich abuse report  The Washington Post
contentSnippet:
Pope Benedict failed to act against abusive priests, Munich Church report finds  NBC News
Report faults Pope Benedict for German priest abuse cases in 1970s, '80s  KRIS 6 News
Pope Benedict XVI knew of abusive priests when he ran Munich archdiocese, investigators say  CNN
Benedict Faulted for Handling of Abuse Cases When He Was an Archbishop  The New York Times
Pope Benedict accused of wrongdoing in Munich abuse report  The Washington Post

localize.title: 教皇ベネディクトは虐待神父に対して行動を起こさず、ミュンヘン教会の報告書によると
慕尼黑教会报告发现，教皇本尼迪克特未能对虐待神父的行为采取行动
慕尼黑教會報告發現，教皇本尼迪克特未能對虐待神父的行爲採取行動
